epic.name: IRONSIGHTS
epic.description: When the target is further than 10m, scoped shot gains 1% damage for each meter.

epic.name: SIDEWINDER
epic.description: When the target is within 10m, unscoped shot gains 15% increased damage.

rare.name: SILVER LIGHTER
rare.description: Damage dealt to Burning targets grants 20% more Ultimate Charge.

epic.name: INFRARED LENSES
epic.description: Deal 25% increased damage to Burning enemies.

rare.name: SILVER SPURS
rare.description: After using [Coach Gun], gain 20% Move Speed for 3s.

powers.title: HEAD HONCHO
powers.description: Each unscoped shot you land increases the damage of the next scoped shot you land by 3%, up to 30%. Resets on reload.

powers.title: INCENDIARY ROUNDS
powers.description: While scoped, hitting the same target without missing deals 30 extra damage.

powers.title: MY BUSINESS, MY RULES
powers.description: When you deal damage to a Burning enemy with [The Viper], reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 10%.

powers.title: RELOAD THERAPY
powers.description: When you reload a shot, heal 3% of your Life.

powers.title: CALAMITY
powers.description: Using [Coach Gun] reloads 2 Ammo. [The Viper]'s next 2 hits deal 40 additional damage over 3s.

powers.title: INCENDIARY BLAST
powers.description: [Coach Gun] applies Burning, dealing 100 damage over 5s. If the target was Burning, deal 75 additional damage instantly.

powers.title: EARLY DETONATION
powers.description: Shooting [Dynamite] reloads 5 Ammo and reduces the cooldown of [Dynamite] by 3s.

powers.title: MOLTEN MUNITIONS
powers.description: When [Dynamite] explodes on the ground, it leaves lava that Burns enemies for 50 every Is.

powers.title: OUT WITH A BANG
powers.description: When [Dynamite] explodes, it spawns 3 sticky explosives that deal 66% reduced damage.

powers.title: B.O.B JR.
powers.description: [B.O.B.] costs 50% less Ultimate Charge but has reduced Life, 50% reduced Attack Speed, and is significantly smaller.

powers.title: PARTNERS IN CRIME
powers.description: You are healed for 100% of [B.O.B.]'s damage dealt and [B.O.B.] is healed for 100% of your damage dealt.
